name: Catch Man
description:
If you get stuck in a wall use ESC to return to the title screen without having to restart!

The game doesn't save so if you restart you will have to start again.

Give the game roughly 20 seconds to load, don't worry it will play!

Dr Monroe is nearly finished in taking over the world. Fight back by using his own minions against him, after all, you're Catch Man!

Made in 1 week for:

The Real Friendly Game Jam

Controls:

LEFT and RIGHT Arrow Keys to MOVE

UP and DOWN Arrow Keys to select a caught ENEMY

Z to throw you CATCH MAN BALLS

X to SEND OUT selected ENEMY

C to RETURN selected ENEMY

V to RELEASE selected ENEMY

Hitting an enemy with the balls will lower their catch field (a circle around them) and once it is depleted, you are able to catch them by hitting one with another ball.

The Physics is partially bugged and there may be glitches with movement and collisions but mostly it should be fine. Due to work I'm unable to fix the bugs before submission.

Make sure to get to the end as there is an ending! Hopefully it's not too hard!

Check out my main game on Twitter @StasisHeroDev 

Or through the other social links on my website https://stasishero.com

- Stasis Hero Developer
